summary: A large-scale view on the events of 1917 in Russia, when the monarchy was overthrown.
cast: Nikolay Popov|Vasili Nikandrov|Layaschenko|Chibisov|Boris Livanov|Mikholyev|Nikolai Padvoisky|Smelsky|Eduard Tisse
director: Directors: Grigoriy Aleksandrov (as G. Aleksandrov), Sergei M. Eisenstein (as S. M. Eisenstein)
title: Octubre
